title: Does anyone know the name of this font?
content:
Does anyone know the name of the smaller font in this invitation?

Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 5.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828183242/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%205_87.png) | 405.5 KB |
author: guerrad

comments.content: Taller could be [Huxley Vertical URW++](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828183242/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/huxley-vertical) and may be one among [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828183242/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/engravers+gothic/)/ [Blair](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828183242/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/blair/)/ [Sackers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828183242/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/sackers+gothic/) could fit your needs...
